remarks: Indexed intersection of class difference.  Generalization of half of theorem "De Morgan's laws" in [Enderton] p. 31.  Use ~ uniiun to recover Enderton's theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2006.)
statement:
iindif2 $p |- ( A =/= (/) -> |^|_ x e. A ( B \ C ) = ( B \ U_ x e. A C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
